text.tspan: History’s hockey stick: Real gross domestic product per capita
Unit 1 'The capitalist revolution’ Section 1.3 'History's Hockey Stick: Growth in income' in The CORE Team, The Economy.
Note: The units of measurement is 2011 US dollar. The chart uses ratio scale. CC-BY-ND-NC
